title: Question 15
prompt: Based on the pattern of the first three squares, from left to right, which square should come next?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback: Shape D is the logical next square in the pattern. There are two elements to the pattern. First, the dots increase in number by one in each consecutive square. The first square has one dot. The second has two, and the third has three. The next square should have four dots. That means the answer will be either Square C or Square D. Second, the pattern goes left-right-left. The first square has dots on the left. The second has dots on the right, and the third has dots on the left. The next square should have dots on the right. Square D has four dots on the right side, so Square D is the best answer.
